title: Gap in the Door - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Shounen Ai

description: Tragedy ended their lives before they were fully lived. But after meeting the Landlord they discovered there was more to come. A bittersweet tale of life and death and the meaning of truly loving one another.>
